Package com.wpi.cs509.service

Class AdministratorService

java.lang.Object
com.wpi.cs509.service.AdministratorService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserService
public class AdministratorService extends Object implements IUserService
AdministratorService provides an interface for administrators to manage accounts, including creating, deleting, updating, and searching for accounts. It implements the IUserService interface.

  • Method Details

    • createNewAccount

      public void createNewAccount(String login, String pin, String name, String balance, String status) throws SQLException
      Creates a new account with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      login - the login username for the account
      pin - the PIN code for the account
      name - the account holder's name
      balance - the initial balance for the account
      status - the account status (e.g., active, inactive)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs while creating the account

    • deleteExistingAccount

      public boolean deleteExistingAccount(String accountNum) throws SQLException
      Deletes an existing account with the specified account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the account number of the account to delete
      Returns:
      true if the account was successfully deleted, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs while deleting the account

    • updateExistingAccount

      public boolean updateExistingAccount(String holder, String status, String login, String pin, String accountNum) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing account with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      holder - the updated account holder name
      status - the updated account status
      login - the updated login username
      pin - the updated PIN code
      accountNum - the account number to update
      Returns:
      true if the account was successfully updated, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs while updating the account

    • getAccountDetails

      public ResultSet getAccountDetails(String accountNum) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the account with the specified account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the account number to retrieve details for
      Returns:
      a ResultSet containing the account details, or an empty result if the account does not exist
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs while retrieving the account details

    • accountExists

      public boolean accountExists(String accountNum) throws SQLException
      Checks whether an account with the specified account number exists.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the account number to check
      Returns:
      true if the account exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs while checking the account existence

    • getAccountHolder

      public String getAccountHolder(String accountNum) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the name of the account holder for the specified account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNum - the account number to retrieve the holder's name for
      Returns:
      the account holder's name if the account exists, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs while retrieving the holder's name

    • getType

      public String getType()
      A function to get the service Type
      Specified by:
      getType in interface IUserService
      Returns:
      a string of the word "admin"
